website_summaries.verdict: A small, inexpensive corner sink that's worth considering for rooms with very limited space.
pros: Minimalist design is perfect for small bathrooms and RVs
Has a nice finish that resists scratches and is easy to clean
cons: Quite small, so it may not be practical for larger rooms

customer_reviews.title: Tiny!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are TINY. I read the measurements, but the image in my head, didn't get it right. They were beautiful, but way too small, so I returned them. If you are looking for a teeny sink, this is it!
customer_reviews.author: MaryP

customer_reviews.title: It is leaking internally and out the back somewhere. So sad!
customer_reviews.text: We did a remodel on a little house, and we added a little powder room. We bought this cute little sink. We are just finishing up on the house, and my husband put the sink in. It is leaking internally, even out the back. It looked just like I wanted it to, but now he is removing it after a huge mess. It looks like it was built in 2 pieces, hopefully it is just this one sink. Unfortunately, we just got to open it to mount it, and it is past the time period where we can return it. I hope that the seller can still make this right.
customer_reviews.author: Austin Cortney Loyd

customer_reviews.title: Unique, small sink
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that it's unique & looks very good in my very small bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Cute, small, tiny corner sink
customer_reviews.text: Sink came with all the accessories for installation. The only downside is that the faucet filter that comes with the sink allows for too much water to flow out, therefore, causing the water to spill out of the sink. I had to purchase a water-saver filter for lower water flow and that seemed to resolve the issue. Other than that, the instructions and installation was easy.
customer_reviews.author: DaviDMorales413

customer_reviews.title: Small but packs a punch
customer_reviews.text: It fits very nice in the bathroom. It served the purpose. Because I had to buy all the fittings, I gave it a 4 star. If it came with all the pipes and fittings I would give it 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Gail Lambert

customer_reviews.title: Needed this small vessel
customer_reviews.text: Just opened since out of town. Exactly what I was looking for. Good quality finish and will install next weekThanks
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: One arrived crushed, but the company responded quickly and a replacement is on the way. These will be perfect for the mid century dresser with pie slice shaped tops on each end. I will post a picture...it might be a while...we work slooooowly!
customer_reviews.author: MaryP

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was a very nice sink just a tiny bit small lol.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Price
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfectly in the corner of my tiny bathroom. Came in quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Yvette Hall

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking and just the size needed for a replacement in RV.
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking and just the size needed for a replacement in RV. By being a corner sink it made more room in rv bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: brenda vincent

customer_reviews.title: Happy Purchaser
customer_reviews.text: Haven't installed it yet . . . . . but, it looks perfect for my situation
customer_reviews.author: Tar Ball

product_meta.title: Renovator's Supply Manufacturing Small Corner Vessel Sink Above Counter Top White Grade A Vitreous China Ceramic With Single Faucet Hole And Overflow Compact Space Saving Design
product_meta.description: Size:SmallThis triangular vessel sink from Renovator's Supply features durable ceramic construction and a practical design for daily use. Features: - Durable, easy clean contemporary vessel sink. - Vessel sinks save space without sacrificing the luxury of a spacious sink. - Constructed from gorgeous Grade A vitreous china ceramic for durability and easy cleanup. - RENO-GLOSS finish protects from scratches and stains. - Authentic Renovator's Supply logo guarantees better quality than the knockoffs. Dimensions: - OVERALL 5-1/8" Tall x 17-1/8" Wide x 12-5/8" Along Wall Other Details: - Installation Style: Countertop - Design Inspirations: Vintage / antique stylings What's Included: - One (1) Triangle Porcelain Vessel Sink
